MCQ: What is the main goal of supervised learning?
Choices: a : To find hidden patterns in data | b : To classify data based on known properties | c : To learn from data without labels | d : To identify anomalies in data

MCQ: Which type of machine learning algorithm does reinforcement learning fall under?
Choices: a : Supervised learning | b : Unsupervised learning | c : Semi-supervised learning | d : Reinforcement learning

MCQ: What is the primary purpose of anomaly detection in machine learning?
Choices: a : To identify common patterns in data | b : To predict future outcomes | c : To detect rare or unusual items in data | d : To reduce the dimensionality of data

MCQ: Which feature learning method involves representing a training example as a linear combination of basis functions?
Choices: a : Sparse dictionary learning | b : Principal component analysis | c : Cluster analysis | d : Manifold learning

MCQ: What is the main characteristic of rule-based machine learning algorithms?
Choices: a : They rely on deep learning techniques | b : They focus on unsupervised learning | c : They learn and apply rules to store knowledge | d : They are primarily used for anomaly detection
